item.title: About
item.description: My name is Nickolas Alvarado if you haven’t already guessed. This is my website. I have always wanted one and I think I can finally write somewhat intelligently about certain topics. I love computers, math, and the internet. What better place to show that than on a website of my own? I hope you learn something by visiting my space. This website was built with Hugo using a modified version of the Cocoa theme.
